entry.title: Photos Post 34: Special Events (after 1975), Part 77
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 10 Photos of the special event 1979-0314 Photos, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 high, 4 medium/high resolutions and 1 medium from the Named Collections and 4 high resolutions from the XYZ Collections.
The direct link to the 18 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: India 1979.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, September 2024

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, September 2024

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month 94 new Photos were uploaded to 24 Pūjas as follows (36 high resolutions, 49 medium/high resolutions, 7 medium resolutions, and 0 low resolutions).
(i) 1913-0000 Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1913.
(ii) 1913-0000 Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1913.
(ii) 1913-0000 Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1913.
(iv) 1977-0200 Pūjā: 3 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1977.
(v) 1977-0321 Birthday Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1977.
(vi) 1978-0204 Pūjā: 1 high resolution and 49 medium/high resolutions uploaded, link India 1978.
(vii) 1979-1202 Guru Pūjā: 2 medium resolutions uploaded, link UK 1979.
(viii) 1980-0214 Śhivarātri Pūjā: 1 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1980.
(ix) 1984-0714 Guru Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link Switzerland 1984.
(x) 1988-0710 Śhrī Haṃsa Chakra Swāminī Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link Germany 1988.
(xi) 1988-0820 Śhrī Viṣhṇumāyā Pūjā: 2 high resolution uploaded, link UK 1988.
(xii) 1990-0109 Śhrī Gaurī Pūjā: 4 medium resolutions uploaded, link India 1990-01 to 11.
(xiii) 1990-0223 Śhivarātri Pūjā: 6 high resolutions and 1 medium resolution uploaded, link India 1990-01 to 11.
(xiv) 1990-0619 Śhrī Kuṇḍalinī Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, Austria 1990.
(xv) 1991-1206 Śhrī 1991-1206 Śhrī Rājarājeśhwarī Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1991-12-01 to 15.
(xvi) 1991-1209 Śhrī Śhakti Mahākālī Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1991-12-01 to 15.
(xvii) 1991-1215 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1991-12-01 to 15.
(xviii) 1991-1221 Śhrī Mahālakṣhmī Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1991-12-16 to 31.
(xix) 1991-1224 Śhrī Gaṇeśha and Christmas Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1991-12-16 to 31.
(xx) 1991-1231 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 3 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1991-12-16 to 31.
(xxi) 1990-0826 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link Austria 1990.
(xxii) 1994-1002 Śhrī Yogeśhwara Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link U.S.A. 1994.
(xxiii) 2001-0422 Easter Pūjā: 1 high resolution1 uploaded, link Turkey 2001.
(xxiv) 2003-0713 Guru Pūjā: 4 high resolutions uploaded, link Italy 2003.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
